projectRoot.description: The root directory of the new application.

name.description: The name of the new application.
name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the application?

enableIvy.description: **EXPERIMENTAL** True to create a new app that uses the Ivy rendering engine.

inlineStyle.description: When true, includes styles inline in the root component.ts file. Only CSS styles can be included inline. Default is false, meaning that an external styles file is created and referenced in the root component.ts file.

inlineTemplate.description: "description": "When true, includes template inline in the root component.ts file. Default is false, meaning that an external template file is created and referenced in the root component.ts file.

viewEncapsulation.description: The view encapsulation strategy to use in the new app.

routing.x-prompt: Would you like to add Angular routing?

prefix.description: The prefix to apply to generated selectors.

style.description: The file extension to be used for style files.

skipPackageJson.description: Do not add dependencies to package.json.

lintFix.description: When true, applies lint fixes after generating the application.

moduleName.description: Sets the name of the demo module
